label: 近松門左衛門
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 4:  Early Modern Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1991
見出し読み: ちかまつもんざえもん
説明文: (1653-1725) [Playwright who] wrote for both the kabuki and puppet theaters and was the first playwright to give plays a dramatic structure, especially in the domestic tragedies he composed (p. 707). [歌舞伎]
